short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep up to date with the most recent guild messages and review your account statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New guild messages received will be sent to the desktop notification system. Clicking the extension icon will popup and window displaying your account statistics (such as current credits and rank) and displays the most recent guild messages. You must first have an astro empires account to use this extension.
